organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Nascar driver Jeremy Mayfield parted ways with Haas CNC Racing, and Johnny Sauter will drive the team’s No. 70 in Phoenix this weekend. The team said the split was mutual, but it came after Mayfield’s 38th-place finish Sunday in Texas. That dropped Mayfield to 36th in the standings, and the car must now qualify on speed.
